User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

when using microsoft owa 2010 and replying to an email


Actual results:

you reply to and email and add a second email that has not auto completed before.  You make a mistake and hit back to correct it. Semi Colon's will appear between the first and second email address.


Expected results:

no additional semi colons
